0.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment"
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize count(), by:{argocd.sync.status}
0.title: Finished Sync Status

17.content:
### Application Sync Events 

This section provides a clear and detailed view of ArgoCD sync activities, such as currently running syncs, status of finished syncs, and performance indicators.

---

46.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### Additional resources
**Pipeline Observability**
* [Observability throughout the software development lifecycle increases delivery performance](https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/observability-throughout-the-software-development-lifecycle/) (blog post)
* [Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/pipeline-observability-concepts) (docs)

**Software Development Lifecycle Events**
* [Ingest SDLC events](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/sdlc-events) (docs)
* [SDLC event specification]() (docs)
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Release v0.1.0, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

51.content:
### ArgoCD Sync and Deployment Pulse

This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the status of ArgoCD sync notifications related to the deployment of new applications. It is designed to help platform engineers and DevOps teams monitor and manage their deployment processes effectively.

53.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment"
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize errorRate = if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(task.outcome == "failure")) / toDouble(count())*100)
53.title: Failure Rate

60.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment"
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize avg(duration)
60.title: Average Sync Duration

62.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment"
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| fields 
Duration = duration,
Application = deployment.name,
Status = argocd.sync.status,
Start = start_time,
End = end_time,
Repository = vcs.repository.url.full
| sort End
62.title: Finished Syncs

63.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| sort timestamp
| summarize status = takeLast(event.status), by:{vcs.ref.base.revision}
| filter status == "started" 
| summarize countDistinct(vcs.ref.base.revision)
63.title: Running Syncs

65.title: Average Sync Duration

66.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize count(), by:{argocd.app.health.status}
66.title: Application (Deployment) Health Status

67.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize median(duration)
67.title: Median Sync Duration

68.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| maketimeseries eventsCount = count(), by:{event.status}, interval:5m
68.title: Sync Activities

69.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| sort timestamp
| summarize sync_status = takeLast(event.status), by:{vcs.ref.base.revision, vcs.repository.url.full, deployment.service.uid, deployment.name, deployment.namespace, deployment.server.url}
| filter sync_status == "started" 
| fieldsAdd Application = deployment.name
| fieldsAdd Namespace = deployment.namespace
| fieldsAdd Server = deployment.server.url 
| fieldsAdd Repository = vcs.repository.url.full
| fieldsRemove sync_status, vcs.ref.base.revision, deployment.service.uid, deployment.name, deployment.namespace, deployment.server.url, vcs.repository.url.full
69.title: Running Syncs

70.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| sort timestamp
| summarize status = takeLast(event.status), by:{vcs.ref.base.revision}
| filter status == "finished" 
| summarize countDistinct(vcs.ref.base.revision)
70.title: Finished Syncs

71.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment"
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize count(), by:{argocd.sync.operation_state.phase}
71.title: Finished Sync Operation State

72.content:
### Deployment overview 

This section provides a comprehensive view of the deployment status across different applications and servers.

---

73.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize deploymentFrequency = count(), by: deployment.name
| sort deploymentFrequency
| limit 5
73.title: Deployment Frequency by Application (Top 5)

74.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| summarize deploymentDuration = avg(duration), by: deployment.server.url
| sort deploymentDuration
| limit 5
74.title: Average Deployment Duration by Server (Top 5)

variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task"  
| filter event.provider=="argocd" 
| summarize distinctApplications = collectDistinct(deployment.name)
| expand distinctApplications
| sort distinctApplications
